title: Mac Download
body: Does anyone know how to download league for mac? ive downloaded it from here ( https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload ) but for some odd reason it wont open up, it does for like 1 second. anyone can help me out?

replies.body:
If it downloaded correctly without any errors, this sounds like League just might not have the admin rights it needs to launch. Check out these steps on setting up Mac Permissions and you should be good to go! Feel free to hit me back up in a reply if it doesn't help too.

https://i.gyazo.com/0f2258473de4d604e5e7fea5c2f271b2.png
I Have done the steps listed and it has yet to work, i appreciate the help though :)

Hmmmm that's alright, even if that doesn't fix it outright it can help point us in the right direction. Go ahead and reach out to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they can take a look through your game logs to see what might be going wrong.
Same thing for me too. I wanted to reinstall and it won't move past the set up files. After you click the icon, it just bounces up and down and nothing happens.
that happens to me but it bounces for like 1 second then disappears
